title: AFS: Employment Gaps Between Military Spouses and Matched Civilians
description: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews Dr. Sarah Meadows about her forthcoming article "Employment Gaps Between Military Spouses and Matched Civilians,” co-authored with Beth Ann Griffin,  Benjamin Karney and Julia Pollak. Publication date: May 18, 2016
content:encoded: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews Dr. Sarah Meadows about her forthcoming article "Employment Gaps Between Military Spouses and Matched Civilians,” co-authored with Beth Ann Griffin,  Benjamin Karney and Julia Pollak. Publication date: May 18, 2016
